Package objects

Class Box

java.lang.Object
objects.Box
public class Box extends Object
Class Box : Represents the foundational game logic for the game board + and contains additional utilities necessary for interacting with the board

    • getHexagon

      public Hexagon getHexagon(int index)
      Method gets Hexagon referenced by passed index in box[]
      Parameters:
      index - - index of hexagon to grab in box[]
      Returns:
      - hexagon referenced by box[index] , or null if index out of bounds

    • getHexagonByCoordinate

      public Hexagon getHexagonByCoordinate(Coordinate location)
      Method gets Hexagon referenced at location matching passed Coordinate
      Parameters:
      location - - Coordinate (location) of Hexagon to grab
      Returns:
      Hexagon matching Coordinate, or null if Hexagon is not in Box
